title: Drawing, "Design for Knotted Pile Bedspread"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Perspective, head-on view of bed with striped bedspread; indications of headboard and wall light fixture.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Knotted Pile Bedspread".
Crayon, graphite on semi-transparent paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-92.
